does intel produce graphics cards...? am: sort of intel makes chips, nvidia (well amd now) makes chips.  some also sell the chips to manufacturers who make cards, and some make cards themselves.  Also they get motherboard makers to include these chips as well.

also when you are trying to detemine what driver to use it is easier to look it up by chip rather then my board type or how it is sold.  Technically linux drivers are for chip types.  And it is why things like sound cards are so problematic (the makers change chips between versions, even on the same model).
